headline: Modern Love: The Podcast | Episode 4
text:
Welcome to the fourth episode of Modern Love: The Podcast, brought to you by The New York Times and WBUR. This week, you’ll hear the filmmaker/producer/screenwriter/comedian Judd Apatow (“Trainwreck,” “Girls,” “Knocked Up,” “The 40-Year-Old Virgin” and “Superbad,” to name just a few) read a 2014 Modern Love essay by Brian Gittis titled “At the Hospital, an Interlude of Clarity.” Afterward, the host Meghna Chakrabarti and the Modern Love editor Daniel Jones will catch up with Mr. Gittis to hear what’s happened since his column ran. Look for the “play” button below.
